meanings.definition: To take back or reclaim something for a new purpose.
meanings.sent1: She reappropriates old clothes to make new designs.
meanings.sent2: The artist reappropriates discarded materials to create unique sculptures.
meanings.sent3: He reappropriates his sister's toys to play pranks on her.
meanings.sent4: Nature reappropriates fallen leaves as nutrients for the soil.
meanings.sent5: The chef reappropriates leftovers into a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: To reuse or repurpose something in a different way.
meanings.sent1: The school reappropriates old textbooks for students in need.
meanings.sent2: The company reappropriates packaging materials to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The cat reappropriates a cardboard box as a cozy hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Time reappropriates memories into stories we tell ourselves.
meanings.sent5: The gardener reappropriates plastic bottles as planters for herbs.
